title: hextech chest disappeared from my loot?
body:
hello, so i think that a hextech chest is missing from my loot?  I left the one hextech chest there for a long time already without intent to open (planning to mass open once i accumulate more) and i realise now it's gone.. Honestly do not remember opening it at all since I have no new skin shards, emotes and pretty much all the champ shards I have are from levelling up.  However, it could be my fault and i accidentally opened it myself, but I hope you could still look into it for me. Thankyou!
(If this helps, 99.9% sure I got the chest from Graves a bit ago)

replies.body: just kidding! godspeed my child. just have to play the waiting game! hahaha! {{sticker:galio-happy}}

Your best bet will be to submit a support ticket: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to nail down when you opened your last chest etc etc. :)
